item.title: Discover the Ancient Demonic Scroll
item.description: Info Key Value Id 2215 Name Discover the Ancient Demonic Scroll Point 20 Description Discover the Ancient Demonic Scroll by the Stormed Citadel portal. Detail Discover the Ancient Demonic Scroll on the steps to the destroyed portal. Conditions(s) Discover the Ancient Demonic Scroll. Tips Spawns randomly after defeating Harnovog in Stormed Citadel
